title: नहीं, इंदिरा गांधी ने आपातकाल के दौरान सीताराम येचुरी को JNUSU अध्यक्ष पद से इस्तीफा देने को मजबूर नहीं किया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: #Mota_Bhai its time for Action. Thukai & Kuttai of these Gaddar Students.#Indira_Gandhi got today’s CPI Leader SitaRamYechuri’s pichhwada beaten Red&Blue in 1975 & then made him to resign Presidentship of JNU+read an apology letter.#This is what is required now in JNU today. pic.twitter.com/pFbWQG0sK4
